confirm: Are you sure to perform this operation?
strongSuccessMsg: Log Settings Policy has been saved successfully.
power_action_wait: Performing Action.. Please Wait(power cycle will wait 30 sec)
str_server_err1: Performing soft power off failed. This may be because the host OS is taking unusual long time to gracefully shut down.
str_server_setaction: There was a problem while receiving response for power action
str_server_getstatus: There was a problem while receiving current status of host.
help_power_off: Select this option to immediately power off the server
help_power_on: Select this option to power on the server
help_power_cycle: Select this option to first power off, and then reboot the system (cold boot)
help_hard_reset: Select this option to reboot the system without powering off (warm boot)
help_acpi_shutdown: Select this option to initiate operating system shutdown prior to the shutdown
